turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello.  I have a story to share with you.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Of course im hear to listen .

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I just donated to Save the Children and feel like it will be super helpful.  There was a child who died of hunger and I think my donation will help other children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes i believe it most DEFINETLY will make a big impact on others lives and its amazing to see such kind hearted people like yourself do so.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thanks! I just read that The United Nations estimated last year 25,000 people still die of hunger daily. That means more than 9.1 million people die of hunger every year.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes its such a sad thing to see happen myself and family are very kind hearted and feel for all the people around the world who are suffering from this , And would love to make a change and to help .

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Great to hear there are still kind hearted people to help people suffering! It makes me angry to know of so many children in danger in the world.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes its so sad how people can go about their day and not think of those who are in great need ! Especially those who are very wealthy themselves and don't care to make a difference

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I agree!  I certainly am not wealthy but still try to make donation as often as I can.  There are some wealthy people that are great philanthropists, but I think more people like you and I are needed to make even small donations.  Have you ever been to the Save the Children website?  URL

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes most definitely i totally agree with you! Yes i do i actually watch a family on youtube that raises money every year live streaming for save the children and all the money they receive goes to save the children

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You can make a donation from your incoming earning from this task to Save the Children.  Even just a small amount makes a difference? I just realized I sound like a telemarketer! Can you donate part of your payment? I think we should.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: As of right now i honestly would but i dont have the funds for it if their are other ways im albe to get others to donate as well and help out in any way possible i will be more then willing to do so..

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Even just a small donation helps. I will donate again if you match the amount of a snack!  Maybe .50 perhaps?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: of course i could do so from my paypal

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: The research team will collect donations and send it to Save the Children. So we don't even need to use Paypal.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: oh okay then thats awsome to hear

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Ok great!  I think we are really part of the solution this way. Especially if that story of a child who died makes you angry like me.  It's so easy we won't even miss it.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Exacally if 50cents can make a differnce in someones like and i can help im all for it !!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: (Inserts high five) My good deed for the day is done! I try to do little things like this whenever I can. In fact, I'm going to match your .50 and donate a $1.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: wow how awsome it will really make a difference and i'm so happy we can both help to make a difference (double high five )

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thanks for agreeing to donate! It was great talking to you and meeting someone who has a big heart like me :)

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thank you For being able to be so kind hearted as well hope u have a great day and keep a smile on your face ;)

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It feels great

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Most definitely does  and hope it will make someone else feel 10 times just as great

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I am glad the Researchers are helping too!  Make it a great day!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes i didnt think that it would be this easy thats amazing

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I have done it this way before and encourage you to do the same. Skipping my candy bar today and feeling great!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: yes i cant wait to be able to do more in the future yes it does feel good to know that will be going to a much better cause

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: (one last high five before I go) I'd love to chat with you more, but I have to run off --- my coffee is brewing and waiting for me to indulge.  Take care and keep doing good!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: same thanks for the advice have a good one keep spreading love
